Unauthorization.isAdminOrOperator: Only admin and operator can do this
Unauthorization.mustBeBuyerOrSeller: Only buyer or seller can do this
Unauthorization.mustNotOwner: Only user is not owner can do this
Unauthorization.AuthorizationisNotProvid: Authorization is not provide or failed process decode
Unauthorization.confirmOnceTimes: You can only confirm once time
Unauthorization.isCorrectUser: Only correct user can do it
InvalidArgument.statusOfOrder: Status only is active or pending
InvalidArgument.requestMustBePending: You only can confirm pending requests
InvalidArgument.BalanceTooLowVolumeMax: Balance must higher than volume max
InvalidArgument.BalanceTooLowWithdrawReq: Balance must higher amount withdraw request
InvalidArgument.VolumeMaxTooHigh: Volume maxmimum must lower than max of Order
InvalidArgument.VolumeMinTooLow: Volume minimum must higher than min of Order
InvalidArgument.ActiveMoreOrder: You only can active one order
InvalidArgument.IncomingTooLow: Incoming amount need greater than incoming Minimum
InvalidArgument.WithdrawTooLow: Withdraw must have amount higher than minimum
InvalidArgument.InvalidUser: User data is invalid, not can create or update
InvalidArgument.InvalidUserId: Cannot find user with invalid id
InvalidArgument.InvalidUserEmail: Cannot find user with invalid email
InvalidArgument.InvalidUserPassword: Cannot find user with invalid password
InvalidStatus.OwnerCreateRequest: You can not create request from your order
InvalidPermission.CreateOrder: You only can create maximum 3 orders
InvalidPermission.InvalidAmountRequest: Amount of request must between than volume available
InvalidPermission.BalanceTooLowAmountCoi: Balance of seller must higher amount of Coin
ObjectNotFound: Can not find data in database
ObjectNotFound.NotFoundUser: login information is not found in database
